videoList.description: You demand performance. You expect precision. And you’ll get it – in one of the most iconic sports cars in the world – the provocatively-designed Corvette Stingray. Your Corvette comes in a coupe or convertible in 3 models… the Stingray, the Grand Sport or the Z06, there’s a Stingray to fit your style.The 6.2 liter V8* in the Stingray is an engineering masterpiece that gets you to 60 in 3.7 seconds*. Thanks to race-proven technologies, it’s lean and mean. It’s equally at home on the track as the freeway with perfectly balanced performance combining revolutionary power with efficiency**. Inside you’ll find the same craftsmanship that went under the hood, with hand-stitched leather and aluminum accents. And this Corvette’s connected. Smart devices seamlessly connect to the internet via available technologies. A number of exhilarating exterior colors are available as well as 3 unique design packages allowing you to boldly customize your Corvette. Make other drivers do a double take when you pass them in your Corvette.

2018 Corvette Performance
Befitting a true performance sports car, a 6.2-liter LT1 V8 engine and a choice of 7-speed manual with active rev matching or available 8-speed paddle-shift automatic transmission, are at the heart of the Stingray. The Z51 performance package makes the Stingray track-ready with a dry sump oil system for high-G cornering and other enhancements. You won’t want to slow down but when it comes time, the ventilated 4-piston Brembo brakes are standard on all Corvette models.
